[He]164-reeks then passed through [it]958-it , and was followed by [the others]450-the others . [We]960-we shall now return to the night of [Ebba]114-ebba ’s seizure by [the mysterious stranger]626-the mysterious stranger . Though almost deprived of consciousness by terror , [the poor girl]962-the poor girl could distinguish , from the movements of [[her]962-the poor girl captor]963-her captor , that [she]962-the poor girl was borne down a flight of steps , or some steep descent , and then for a considerable distance along level ground . [She]962-the poor girl was next placed in [a carriage]964-a carriage , which was driven with great swiftness , and though it was impossible to conjecture in what direction [she]962-the poor girl was conveyed , it seemed to [her]962-the poor girl terrified imagination as if [she]962-the poor girl were hurried down a precipice , and [she]962-the poor girl expected every moment to be dashed in pieces . At length [the vehicle]709-the vehicle stopped , and [she]962-the poor girl was lifted out of it , and carried along [a winding passage]966-a winding passage ; after which , the creaking of hinges announced that a door was opened . Having passed through it , [she]962-the poor girl was deposited on a bench , when , fright overmastering [her]962-the poor girl , [her]962-the poor girl senses completely forsook [her]962-the poor girl . On recovering , [she]962-the poor girl found [herself]962-the poor girl seated on [a fauteuil covered with black velvet]967-a fauteuil covered with black velvet , in the midst of [a gloomy chamber of vast extent]968-a gloomy chamber of vast extent , while beside [her]962-the poor girl , and supporting [her]962-the poor girl from falling , stood [the mysterious and terrible stranger]969-the mysterious and terrible stranger . [He]969-the mysterious and terrible stranger held a large goblet filled with some potent liquid to [her]962-the poor girl lips , and compelled [her]962-the poor girl to swallow a portion of it . [The powerful stimulant]970-the powerful stimulant revived [her]962-the poor girl , but , at the same time , produced a strange excitement , against which [she]962-the poor girl struggled with all [her]962-the poor girl power . [[Her]962-the poor girl persecutor]971-her persecutor again held the goblet towards [her]962-the poor girl , while a sardonic smile played upon [his]969-the mysterious and terrible stranger features . “ Drink ! ”[969-the mysterious and terrible stranger] [he]969-the mysterious and terrible stranger cried ; “ it will restore [you]962-the poor girl , and [you]962-the poor girl have much to go through . ”[969-the mysterious and terrible stranger] [Ebba]114-ebba mechanically took the cup , and raised it to [her]114-ebba lips , but noticing [the stranger]599-the stranger ’s glance of exultation , dashed it to the ground . “ [You]962-the poor girl have acted foolishly , ”[969-the mysterious and terrible stranger] [he]969-the mysterious and terrible stranger said sternly ; “ the potion would have done [you]962-the poor girl good . ”[969-the mysterious and terrible stranger] Withdrawing [her]114-ebba eyes from [his]599-the stranger gaze , which [she]114-ebba felt exercised an irresistible influence over [her]114-ebba , [Ebba]114-ebba gazed fearfully round [the chamber]1641-the chamber . [It]1641-the chamber was vast and gloomy , and seemed like the interior of a sepulchre — the walls and ceiling being formed of black marble , while the floor was paved with the same material . Not far from where [she]114-ebba sat , on [an estrade , approached by a couple of steps]974-an estrade , approached by a couple of steps , stood a table covered with black velvet , on which was placed an immense lamp , fashioned like an imp supporting a caldron on [his]599-the stranger outstretched wings . In this lamp were several burners , which cast a lurid light throughout [the chamber]1641-the chamber . Over it hung a cap equally fantastically fashioned . A dagger , with a richly wrought hilt , was stuck into the table ; and beside it lay a strangely shaped mask , an open book , an antique inkstand , and a piece of parchment , on which some characters were inscribed . Opposite these stood a curiously carved ebony chair . At the lower end of [the room]405-the room , which was slightly elevated above the rest , hung a large black curtain ; and on the step , in the front of [it]1641-the chamber , were placed two vases of jet . “ What is behind that curtain ? ”[599-the stranger] shudderingly demanded [Ebba]114-ebba of [[her]114-ebba companion]977-her companion . “ [You]114-ebba will see [anon]1978-anon , ”[599-the stranger] [he]599-the stranger replied . “ Meanwhile , seat [yourself]114-ebba on that chair , and glance at the writing on the scroll . ”[114-ebba] [Ebba]114-ebba did not move , but [the stranger]599-the stranger took [her]114-ebba hand , and drew [her]114-ebba to the seat . “ Read what is written on that paper , ”[599-the stranger] [he]599-the stranger cried imperiously . [Ebba]114-ebba glanced at the document , and a shudder passed over [her]114-ebba frame . “ By this , ”[114-ebba] [she]114-ebba cried , “ [I]114-ebba surrender [myself]114-ebba , soul and body , to [you]599-the stranger ? ”[114-ebba] “ [You]114-ebba do , ”[599-the stranger] replied [the stranger]599-the stranger . “ [I]114-ebba have committed no crime that can place [me]114-ebba within the power of [the Fiend]1979-the fiend , ”[114-ebba] cried [Ebba]114-ebba , falling upon [her]114-ebba knees . “ [I]114-ebba call upon Heaven for protection ! Avaunt ! ”[114-ebba] As the words were uttered , the cap suddenly fell upon the lamp , and [the chamber]1641-the chamber was buried in profound darkness . Mocking laughter rang in [her]114-ebba ears , succeeded by wailing cries inexpressibly dreadful to hear . [Ebba]114-ebba continued to pray fervently for [her]114-ebba own deliverance , and for that of [Auriol]93-auriol . In the midst of [her]114-ebba supplications [she]114-ebba was aroused by strains of music of the most exquisite sweetness , proceeding apparently from behind the curtain , and while listening to these sounds [she]114-ebba was startled by a deafening crash as if a large gong had been stricken . The cover of the lamp was then slowly raised , and the burners blazed forth as before , while from the two vases in front of the curtain arose clouds of incense , filling [the chamber]1641-the chamber with stupefying fragrance . Again the gong was stricken , and [Ebba]114-ebba looked round towards the curtain . Above each vase towered [a gigantic figure , wrapped in a long black cloak , the lower part of which was concealed by the thick vapour]982-a gigantic figure , wrapped in a long black cloak , the lower part of which was concealed by the thick vapour . Hoods , like the cowls of [monks]983-monks , were drawn over the heads of [these grim and motionless figures]984-these grim and motionless figures ; mufflers enveloped [their]984-these grim and motionless figures chins , and [they]984-these grim and motionless figures wore masks , from the holes of which gleamed eyes of unearthly brightness . [Their]984-these grim and motionless figures hands were crossed upon [their]984-these grim and motionless figures breasts . Between [them]984-these grim and motionless figures squatted two other spectral forms , similarly cloaked , hooded , and masked , with [their]984-these grim and motionless figures gleaming eyes fixed upon [her]114-ebba , and [their]984-these grim and motionless figures skinny fingers pointed derisively at [her]114-ebba . Behind the curtain was placed a strong light , which showed [a wide staircase of black marble]985-a wide staircase of black marble , leading to [some upper chamber]986-some upper chamber , and at the same time threw the reflection of [a gigantic figure upon the drapery]987-a gigantic figure upon the drapery , while a hand , the finger of which pointed towards [her]114-ebba , was thrust from an opening between its folds . Forcibly averting [her]114-ebba gaze , [Ebba]114-ebba covered [her]114-ebba eyes with [her]114-ebba hands , but looking up again after a brief space , beheld an ebon door at the side revolve upon [its]988-its hinges , and give entrance to [three female figures]989-three female figures , robed in black , hooded and veiled , and having [their]989-three female figures hands folded , in a melancholy manner , across [their]989-three female figures breasts . Slowly and noiselessly advancing , [they]989-three female figures halted within a few paces of [her]114-ebba . “ Who and what are [ye]989-three female figures ? ”[114-ebba] [she]114-ebba cried , wild with terror . “ [The victims of [Auriol]93-auriol]1980-the victims of auriol ! ”[990-the figure on the right] replied [the figure on the right]990-the figure on the right . “ As [we]1980-the victims of auriol are , such will [you]114-ebba be ere long . ”[990-the figure on the right] “ What crime have [you]990-the figure on the right committed ? ”[114-ebba] demanded [Ebba]114-ebba . “ [We]1980-the victims of auriol have loved [him]93-auriol , ”[991-the second figure] replied [the second figure]991-the second figure . “ Is that a crime ? ”[114-ebba] cried [Ebba]114-ebba . “ If so , [I]114-ebba am equally culpable with [you]114-ebba . ”[114-ebba] “ [You]114-ebba will share [our]1980-the victims of auriol doom , ”[992-the third figure] replied [the third figure]992-the third figure . “ Heaven have mercy upon [me]993-the agonised girl ! ”[993-the agonised girl] exclaimed [the agonised girl]993-the agonised girl , dropping upon [her]993-the agonised girl knees . At this moment [a terrible voice from behind the curtain]994-a terrible voice from behind the curtain exclaimed , “ Sign , or [Auriol]93-auriol is lost for ever . ”[994-a terrible voice from behind the curtain] “ [I]114-ebba can not yield [my]114-ebba soul , even to save [him]93-auriol , ”[114-ebba] cried [Ebba]114-ebba distractedly . “ Witness [his]93-auriol chastisement , then , ”[995-the voice] cried [the voice]995-the voice . And as the words were uttered , a side door was opened on the opposite side , and [Auriol]93-auriol was dragged forth from [it]996-it by [two masked personages]997-two masked personages , who looked like [familiars of the Inquisition]998-familiars of the inquisition . “ Do not yield to the demands of [this fiend]1883-this fiend , [Ebba]114-ebba ! ”[93-auriol] cried [Auriol]93-auriol , gazing at [her]114-ebba distractedly . “ Will [you]114-ebba save [him]93-auriol before [he]93-auriol is cast , living , into [the tomb]1982-the tomb ? ”[995-the voice] cried [the voice]995-the voice . And at the words , a heavy slab of marble rose slowly from the floor near where [Ebba]114-ebba sat , and disclosed a dark pit beneath . [Ebba]114-ebba gazed into [the abyss]1000-the abyss with indescribable terror . “ There [he]93-auriol will be immured , unless [you]114-ebba sign , ”[995-the voice] cried [the voice]995-the voice ; “ and , as [he]93-auriol is immortal , [he]93-auriol will endure an eternity of torture . ”[995-the voice] “ [I]114-ebba can not save [him]93-auriol so , but [I]114-ebba may precede [him]93-auriol , ”[114-ebba] cried [Ebba]114-ebba . And throwing [her]114-ebba hands aloft , [she]114-ebba flung [herself]114-ebba into the pit . A fearful cry resounded through [the chamber]1641-the chamber . It broke from [Auriol]93-auriol , who vainly strove to burst from those who held [him]93-auriol , and precipitate [himself]93-auriol after [Ebba]114-ebba . Soon after this , and while [Auriol]93-auriol was gazing into [the abyss]1000-the abyss , a tongue of blue flame arose from it , danced for a moment in the air , and then vanished . No sooner was it gone than a figure , shrouded in black habiliments , and hooded and muffled up like the three other female forms , slowly ascended from [the vault]322-the vault , apparently without support , and remained motionless at its brink . “ [Ebba]114-ebba ! ”[93-auriol] exclaimed [Auriol]93-auriol , in a voice of despair . “ Is it [you]114-ebba ? ”[93-auriol] [The figure]1005-the figure bowed [its]1005-the figure head , but spoke not . “ Sign ! ”[995-the voice] thundered [the voice]995-the voice . “ [Your]114-ebba attempt at self - destruction has placed [you]114-ebba wholly in [my]995-the voice power . Sign ! ”[995-the voice] At this injunction , [the figure]1005-the figure moved slowly towards the table , and to [his]93-auriol unspeakable horror , [Auriol]93-auriol beheld [it]1005-the figure take up the pen and write upon the parchment . [He]93-auriol bent forward , and saw that the name inscribed thereon was [Ebba Thorneycroft]114-ebba . The groan to which [he]93-auriol gave utterance was echoed by a roar of diabolical laughter . [The figure]1005-the figure then moved slowly away , and ranged [itself]1005-the figure with the other veiled forms . “ All is accomplished , ”[995-the voice] cried [the voice]995-the voice . “ Away with [him]1010-a man , wrapped in a large horseman ’s cloak , and of strange and sinister appearance ! ”[995-the voice] On this , a terrible clangour was heard ; the lights were extinguished ; and [Auriol]93-auriol was dragged through the doorway from which [he]93-auriol had been brought forth . On the night of the 1st of March 1800 , and at a late hour , [a man , wrapped in a large horseman ’s cloak , and of strange and sinister appearance]1010-a man , wrapped in a large horseman ’s cloak , and of strange and sinister appearance , entered [an old deserted house in [the neighbourhood of [Stepney Green]65-stepney green]1012-the neighbourhood of stepney green]1011-an old deserted house in the neighbourhood of stepney green . [He]1010-a man , wrapped in a large horseman ’s cloak , and of strange and sinister appearance was tall , carried [himself]1010-a man , wrapped in a large horseman ’s cloak , and of strange and sinister appearance very erect , and seemed in the full vigour of early manhood ; but [his]1010-a man , wrapped in a large horseman ’s cloak , and of strange and sinister appearance features had a worn and ghastly look , as if bearing the stamp of long - indulged and frightful excesses , while [his]1010-a man , wrapped in a large horseman ’s cloak , and of strange and sinister appearance dark gleaming eyes gave [him]1010-a man , wrapped in a large horseman ’s cloak , and of strange and sinister appearance an expression almost diabolical . [This person]415-this person had gained [the house]1655-the house from [a garden behind [it]1655-the house]1015-a garden behind it , and now stood in [a large dismantled hall]1016-a large dismantled hall , from which a broad oaken staircase , with curiously - carved banisters , led to [a gallery]1017-a gallery , and thence to [the upper chambers of the habitation]1018-the upper chambers of the habitation . Nothing could be more dreary than the aspect of [the place]274-the place . The richly - moulded ceiling was festooned with spiders ’ webs , and in some places had fallen in heaps upon the floor ; the glories of the tapestry upon the walls were obliterated by damps ; the squares of black and white marble , with which [the hall]1020-the hall was paved , were loosened , and quaked beneath the footsteps ; the wide and empty fireplace yawned like the mouth of [a cavern]1021-a cavern ; the bolts of the closed windows were rusted in their sockets ; and the heaps of dust before the outer door proved that long years had elapsed since [any one]673-any one had passed through [it]1011-an old deserted house in the neighbourhood of stepney green . Taking a dark lantern from beneath [his]1010-a man , wrapped in a large horseman ’s cloak , and of strange and sinister appearance cloak , [the individual in question]1023-the individual in question gazed for a moment around [him]1010-a man , wrapped in a large horseman ’s cloak , and of strange and sinister appearance , and then , with a sardonic smile playing upon [his]1010-a man , wrapped in a large horseman ’s cloak , and of strange and sinister appearance features , directed [his]1010-a man , wrapped in a large horseman ’s cloak , and of strange and sinister appearance steps towards [a room on the right]1024-a room on the right , the door of which stood open . [This chamber]1025-this chamber , which was large and cased with oak , was wholly unfurnished , like [the hall]1020-the hall , and in an equally dilapidated condition . The only decoration remaining on [its]1025-this chamber walls was the portrait of [a venerable personage in the cap and gown of Henry the Eighth]1027-a venerable personage in the cap and gown of henry the eighth ’s time , painted against a panel — a circumstance which had probably saved [it]1025-this chamber from destruction — and beneath it , fixed in another panel , a plate of brass , covered with mystical characters and symbols , and inscribed with the name “ [Cyprianus de Rougemont]166-cyprianus de rougemont , [Fra . R.C. ”[298-the young man] The same name]1983-fra . r.c. ” the same name likewise appeared upon a label beneath the portrait , with the date 1550 . Pausing before the portrait , [the young man]298-the young man threw the light of the lantern full upon it , and revealed features somewhat resembling [his]298-the young man own in form , but of a severe and philosophic cast . In the eyes alone could be discerned the peculiar and terrible glimmer which distinguished [his]298-the young man own glances . After regarding the portrait for some time fixedly , [he]298-the young man thus addressed it : “ Dost hear [me]298-the young man , [old ancestor]1984-old ancestor ? ”[298-the young man] [he]298-the young man cried . “ [I]1029-i , [[thy]1984-old ancestor descendant]1985-thy descendant , [Cyprian de Rougemont]167-rougemont , call upon [thee]1984-old ancestor to point out where [thy]1984-old ancestor gold is hidden ? [I]1029-i know that [thou]1984-old ancestor [wert]1984-old ancestor [a brother of [the Rosy Cross]168-the rosy cross]1986-a brother of the rosy cross — one of [the illuminati]1987-the illuminati — and didst penetrate the mysteries of nature , and enter [the region of light]1988-the region of light . [I]1029-i know , also , that [thou]1984-old ancestor wert buried in [this house]1684-this house with a vast treasure ; but though [I]1029-i have made diligent search for it , and [others]698-others have searched before [me]1029-i , [thy]1984-old ancestor grave has never yet been discovered ! Listen to [me]1029-i ! Methought [Satan]169-satan appeared to [me]1029-i in a dream last night , and bade [me]1029-i come hither , and [I]1029-i should find what [I]1029-i sought . The conditions [he]169-satan proposed were , that [I]1029-i should either give [him]169-satan [my]1029-i own soul , or win [him]169-satan that of [Auriol Darcy]93-auriol . [I]1029-i assented . [I]1029-i am here . Where is [thy]1984-old ancestor treasure ? ”[1029-i] After a pause , [he]1029-i struck the portrait with [his]1029-i clenched hand , exclaiming in a loud voice : “ Dost hear [me]1029-i , [I]1029-i say , [old ancestor]1984-old ancestor ? [I]1029-i call on [thee]1984-old ancestor to give [me]1029-i [thy]1984-old ancestor treasure . Dost hear , [I]1029-i say ? ”[1029-i] And [he]1029-i repeated the blow with greater violence . Disturbed by the shock , the brass plate beneath the picture started from its place , and fell to the ground . “ What is this ? ”[167-rougemont] cried [Rougemont]167-rougemont , gazing into the aperture left by the plate . “ Ha!—my invocation has been heard ! ”[167-rougemont] And , snatching up the lantern , [he]167-rougemont discovered , at the bottom of a little recess , about two feet deep , a stone , with an iron ring in the centre of it . Uttering a joyful cry , [he]167-rougemont seized the ring , and drew the stone forward without difficulty , disclosing an open space beyond [it]1030-it . “ This , then , is the entrance to [[[my]167-rougemont ancestor]1992-my ancestor ’s tomb]1993-my ancestor ’s tomb , ”[167-rougemont] cried [Rougemont]167-rougemont ; “ there can be no doubt of [it]1994-it . [The old Rosicrucian]1995-the old rosicrucian has kept [his]1995-the old rosicrucian secret well ; but [the devil]1650-the devil has helped [me]167-rougemont to wrest it from [him]1995-the old rosicrucian . And now to procure the necessary implements , in case , as is not unlikely , [I]167-rougemont should experience further difficulty . ”[167-rougemont] With this [he]167-rougemont hastily quitted [the room]405-the room , but returned almost immediately with a mallet , a lever , and a pitchfork ; armed with which and the lantern , [he]167-rougemont crept through the aperture . This done , [he]167-rougemont found [himself]167-rougemont at the head of a stone staircase , which [he]167-rougemont descended , and came to the arched entrance of [a vault]1032-a vault . The door , which was of stout oak , was locked , but holding up the light towards it , [he]167-rougemont read the following inscription : “ In two hundred and fifty years [I]167-rougemont shall open ! ”[167-rougemont] cried [Rougemont]167-rougemont , “ and the date 1550 — why , the exact time is arrived . [Old Cyprian]167-rougemont must have foreseen what would happen , and evidently intended to make [me]167-rougemont [[his]167-rougemont heir]1997-his heir . There was no occasion for [the devil]1650-the devil ’s interference . And see , the key is in the lock . So ! ”[167-rougemont] And [he]167-rougemont turned it , and pushing against the door with some force , the rusty hinges gave way , and it fell inwards . From the aperture left by the fallen door , a soft and silvery light streamed forth , and , stepping forward , [Rougemont]167-rougemont found [himself]167-rougemont in [a spacious vault]1033-a spacious vault , from the ceiling of which hung a large globe of crystal , containing in its heart a little flame , which diffused a radiance , gentle as that of the moon , around . This , then , was the ever - burning lamp of [the Rosicrucians]1034-the rosicrucians , and [Rougemont]167-rougemont gazed at it with astonishment . Two hundred and fifty years had elapsed since that wondrous flame had been lighted , and yet it burnt on brightly as ever . Hooped round the globe was a serpent with its tail in its mouth — an emblem of eternity — wrought in purest gold ; while above it were a pair of silver wings , in allusion to the soul . Massive chains of the more costly metal , fashioned like twisted snakes , served as suspenders to the lamp . But [Rougemont]167-rougemont ’s astonishment at this marvel quickly gave way to other feelings , and [he]167-rougemont gazed around [the vault]322-the vault with greedy eyes . It was [a septilateral chamber]1036-a septilateral chamber , about eight feet high , built of stone , and supported by beautifully groined arches . The surface of the masonry was as smooth and fresh as if the chisel had only just left it . In six of the corners were placed large chests , ornamented with ironwork of the most exquisite workmanship , and these [Rougemont]167-rougemont ’s imagination pictured as filled with inexhaustible treasure ; while in the seventh corner , near the door , was a beautiful little piece of monumental sculpture in white marble , representing [two kneeling and hooded figures]1037-two kneeling and hooded figures , holding a veil between [them]1037-two kneeling and hooded figures , which partly concealed the entrance to a small recess . On one of the chests opposite the monument just described stood a strangely - formed bottle and a cup of antique workmanship , both encrusted with gems . The walls were covered with circles , squares , and diagrams , and in some places were ornamented with grotesque carvings . In the centre of [the vault]322-the vault was a round altar , of black marble , covered with a plate of gold , on which [Rougemont]167-rougemont read the following inscription : “ Here , then , [old Cyprian]170-old cyprian lies , ”[167-rougemont] [he]167-rougemont cried . And , prompted by some irresistible impulse , [he]167-rougemont seized the altar by the upper rim , and overthrew it . The heavy mass of marble fell with a thundering crash , breaking asunder the flag beneath it . It might be the reverberation of the vaulted roof , but a deep groan seemed to reproach [the young man]298-the young man for [his]298-the young man sacrilege . Undeterred , however , by this warning , [Rougemont]167-rougemont placed the point of the lever between the interstices of the broken stone , and , exerting all [his]167-rougemont strength , speedily raised the fragments , and laid open the grave . Within it , in the garb [he]167-rougemont wore in life , with [his]167-rougemont white beard streaming to [his]167-rougemont waist , lay the uncoffined body of [[his]167-rougemont ancestor]1040-his ancestor , [Cyprian de Rougemont]167-rougemont . The corpse had evidently been carefully embalmed , and the features were unchanged by decay . Upon the breast , with the hands placed over it , lay a large book , bound in black vellum , and fastened with brazen clasps . Instantly possessing [himself]167-rougemont of this mysterious - looking volume , [Rougemont]167-rougemont knelt upon the nearest chest , and opened it . But [he]167-rougemont was disappointed in [his]167-rougemont expectation . All the pages [he]167-rougemont examined were filled with cabalistic characters , which [he]167-rougemont was totally unable to decipher . At length , however , [he]167-rougemont chanced upon one page the import of which [he]167-rougemont comprehended , and [he]167-rougemont remained for some time absorbed in its contemplation , while an almost fiendish smile played upon [his]167-rougemont features . “ Aha ! ”[167-rougemont] [he]167-rougemont exclaimed , closing the volume , “ [I]167-rougemont see now the cause of [my]167-rougemont extraordinary dream . [[My]167-rougemont ancestor]1992-my ancestor ’s wondrous power was of infernal origin — the result , in fact , of a compact with [the Prince of Darkness]2000-the prince of darkness . But what care [I]167-rougemont for that ? Give [me]167-rougemont wealth — no matter what source it comes from!—ha ! ha ! ”[167-rougemont] And seizing the lever , [he]167-rougemont broke open the chest beside [him]167-rougemont . It was filled with bars of silver . The next [he]167-rougemont visited in the same way was full of gold . The third was laden with pearls and precious stones ; and the rest contained treasure to an incalculable amount . [Rougemont]167-rougemont gazed at [them]1041-them in transports of joy . “ At length [I]167-rougemont have [my]167-rougemont wish , ”[167-rougemont] [he]167-rougemont cried . “ Boundless wealth , and therefore boundless power , is [mine]167-rougemont . [I]167-rougemont can riot in pleasure — riot in vengeance . As to [my]167-rougemont soul , [I]167-rougemont will run the risk of its perdition ; but it shall go hard if [I]167-rougemont destroy not that of [Auriol]93-auriol . [His]93-auriol love of play and [his]93-auriol passion for [Edith Talbot]171-edith shall be the means by which [I]167-rougemont will work . But [I]167-rougemont must not neglect another agent which is offered [me]167-rougemont . That bottle , [I]167-rougemont have learnt from yon volume , contains an infernal potion , which , without destroying life , shatters the brain , and creates maddening fancies . It will well serve [my]167-rougemont purpose ; and [I]167-rougemont thank [thee]2001-thee , [Satan]169-satan , for the gift . ”[167-rougemont] About two months after this occurrence , and near midnight , [a young man]295-a young man was hurrying along [Pall Mall]66-pall mall , with a look of the wildest despair , when [his]295-a young man headlong course was suddenly arrested by a strong grasp , while a familiar voice sounded in [his]295-a young man ear . “ It is useless to meditate self - destruction , [Auriol Darcy]93-auriol , ”[1043-the person who had checked him] cried [the person who had checked [him]295-a young man]1043-the person who had checked him . “ If [you]295-a young man find life a burden , [I]1043-the person who had checked him can make it tolerable to [you]295-a young man . ”[1043-the person who had checked him] Turning round at the appeal , [Auriol]93-auriol beheld [a tall man]593-a tall man , wrapped in a long black cloak , whose sinister features were well known to [him]93-auriol . “ Leave [me]93-auriol , [Rougemont]167-rougemont ! ”[93-auriol] [he]93-auriol cried fiercely . “ [I]93-auriol want [no society]2002-no society — above all , not [yours]167-rougemont . [You]167-rougemont know very well that [you]167-rougemont have ruined [me]93-auriol , and that nothing more is to be got from [me]93-auriol . Leave [me]93-auriol , [I]93-auriol say , or [I]93-auriol may do [you]167-rougemont a mischief . ”[93-auriol] “ Tut , tut , [Auriol]93-auriol , [I]167-rougemont am [[your]167-rougemont friend]2003-your friend ! ”[167-rougemont] replied [Rougemont]167-rougemont . “ [I]167-rougemont purpose to relieve [your]167-rougemont distress . ”[167-rougemont] “ Will [you]167-rougemont give [me]93-auriol back the money [you]167-rougemont have won from [me]93-auriol ? ”[93-auriol] cried [Auriol]93-auriol . “ Will [you]167-rougemont pay [my]93-auriol inexorable creditors ? Will [you]167-rougemont save [me]93-auriol from [a prison]2004-a prison ? ”[93-auriol] “ [I]167-rougemont will do all this , and more , ”[167-rougemont] replied [Rougemont]167-rougemont . “ [I]167-rougemont will make [you]167-rougemont [one of [the richest men in [London]13-london]2006-the richest men in london]2005-one of the richest men in london . ”[167-rougemont] “ Spare [your]167-rougemont insulting jests , [sir]1707-sir , ”[93-auriol] cried [Auriol]93-auriol . “ [I]93-auriol am in no mood to bear them . ”[93-auriol] “ [I]167-rougemont am not jesting , ”[167-rougemont] rejoined [Rougemont]167-rougemont . “ Come with [me]93-auriol , and [you]167-rougemont shall be convinced of [my]93-auriol sincerity . ”[93-auriol] [Auriol]93-auriol at length assented , and [they]1045-they turned into [Saint James ’s Square]67-saint james ’s square , and paused before [a magnificent house]1046-a magnificent house . [Rougemont]167-rougemont ascended the steps . [Auriol]93-auriol , who had accompanied [him]167-rougemont almost mechanically , gazed at [him]167-rougemont with astonishment . “ Do [you]167-rougemont live [here]1437-here ? ”[93-auriol] [he]93-auriol inquired . “ Ask no questions , ”[167-rougemont] replied [Rougemont]167-rougemont , knocking at the door , which was instantly opened by [a hall porter]1047-a hall porter , while [other servants in rich liveries]1048-other servants in rich liveries appeared at a distance . [Rougemont]167-rougemont addressed a few words in an undertone to [them]1048-other servants in rich liveries , and [they]1048-other servants in rich liveries instantly bowed respectfully to [Auriol]93-auriol , while [the foremost of [them]1048-other servants in rich liveries]1049-the foremost of them led the way up a magnificent staircase . All this was a mystery to [the young man]298-the young man , but [he]298-the young man followed [[his]298-the young man conductor]1051-his conductor without a word , and was presently ushered into [a gorgeously - furnished and brilliantly - illuminated apartment]1052-a gorgeously - furnished and brilliantly - illuminated apartment . [The servant]1053-the servant then left [them]1048-other servants in rich liveries ; and as soon as [he]1053-the servant was gone [Auriol]93-auriol exclaimed , “ Is it to mock [me]93-auriol that [you]167-rougemont have brought [me]93-auriol hither ? ”[93-auriol] “ To mock [you]93-auriol — no , ”[167-rougemont] replied [Rougemont]167-rougemont . “ [I]167-rougemont have told [you]93-auriol that [I]167-rougemont mean to make [you]93-auriol rich . But [you]93-auriol look greatly exhausted . A glass of wine will revive [you]93-auriol . ”[167-rougemont] And as [he]167-rougemont spoke , [he]167-rougemont stepped towards a small cabinet , and took from it a curiously - shaped bottle and a goblet . “ Taste this wine — it has been long in [[our]2009-our family]2010-our family , ”[167-rougemont] [he]167-rougemont added , filling the cup . “ It is a strange , bewildering drink , ”[93-auriol] cried [Auriol]93-auriol , setting down the empty goblet , and passing [his]93-auriol hand before [his]93-auriol eyes . “ [You]93-auriol have taken it upon an empty stomach — that is all , ”[167-rougemont] said [Rougemont]167-rougemont . “ [You]93-auriol will be better anon . ”[167-rougemont] “ [I]93-auriol feel as if [I]93-auriol were going mad , ”[93-auriol] cried [Auriol]93-auriol . “ It is some damnable potion [you]93-auriol have given [me]93-auriol . ”[93-auriol] “ Ha ! ha ! ”[167-rougemont] laughed [Rougemont]167-rougemont . “ It reminds [you]93-auriol of the elixir [you]93-auriol once quaffed — eh ? ”[167-rougemont] “ A truce to this raillery ! ”[93-auriol] cried [Auriol]93-auriol angrily . “ [I]93-auriol have said [I]93-auriol am in no mood to bear it . ”[93-auriol] “ [Pshaw]105-pshaw ! [I]244-the other mean no offence , ”[244-the other] rejoined [the other]244-the other , changing [his]244-the other manner . “ What think [you]93-auriol of [this house]1684-this house ? ”[244-the other] “ That [it]1684-this house is magnificent , ”[93-auriol] replied [Auriol]93-auriol , gazing around . “ [I]93-auriol envy [you]93-auriol [its]1684-this house possession . ”[93-auriol] “ It shall be [yours]93-auriol , if [you]93-auriol please , ”[167-rougemont] replied [Rougemont]167-rougemont . “ [Mine]167-rougemont ! [you]93-auriol are mocking [me]167-rougemont again . ”[167-rougemont] “ Not in the least . [You]93-auriol shall buy it from [me]244-the other , if [you]93-auriol please . ”[244-the other] “ At what price ? ”[93-auriol] asked [Auriol]93-auriol bitterly . “ At a price [you]93-auriol can easily pay , ”[244-the other] replied [the other]244-the other . “ Come this way , and [we]1057-we will conclude the bargain . ”[244-the other] Proceeding towards the farther end of [the room]405-the room , [they]1057-we entered [a small exquisitely - furnished chamber , surrounded with sofas of the most luxurious description]1058-a small exquisitely - furnished chamber , surrounded with sofas of the most luxurious description . In the midst was a table , on which writing materials were placed . “ It were a fruitless boon to give [you]93-auriol [this house]1684-this house without the means of living in [it]1684-this house , ”[167-rougemont] said [Rougemont]167-rougemont , carefully closing the door . “ This pocket - book will furnish [you]93-auriol with them . ”[167-rougemont] “ Notes to an immense amount ! ”[93-auriol] cried [Auriol]93-auriol , opening the pocket - book , and glancing at its contents . “ They are [yours]93-auriol , together with [the house]1655-the house , ”[167-rougemont] cried [Rougemont]167-rougemont , “ if [you]93-auriol will but sign a compact with [me]167-rougemont . ”[167-rougemont] “ A compact ! ”[93-auriol] cried [Auriol]93-auriol , regarding [him]167-rougemont with a look of undefinable terror . “ Who and what are [you]167-rougemont ? ”[93-auriol] “ [Some men]2014-some men would call [me]167-rougemont [the devil]1650-the devil ! ”[167-rougemont] replied [Rougemont]167-rougemont carelessly . “ But [you]93-auriol know [me]167-rougemont too well to suppose that [I]167-rougemont merit such a designation . [I]167-rougemont offer [you]93-auriol wealth . What more could [you]93-auriol require ? ”[167-rougemont] “ But upon what terms ? ”[93-auriol] demanded [Auriol]93-auriol . “ The easiest imaginable , ”[244-the other] replied [the other]244-the other . “ [You]93-auriol shall judge for [yourself]93-auriol . ”[167-rougemont] And as [he]167-rougemont spoke , [he]167-rougemont opened a writing - desk upon the table , and took from it a parchment . “ Sit down , ”[167-rougemont] [he]167-rougemont added , “ and read this . ”[167-rougemont] [Auriol]93-auriol complied , and as [he]93-auriol scanned the writing [he]93-auriol became transfixed with fear and astonishment , while the pocket - book dropped from [his]93-auriol grasp . After a while [he]93-auriol looked up at [Rougemont]167-rougemont , who was leaning over [his]93-auriol shoulder , and whose features were wrinkled with a derisive smile . “ Then [you]167-rougemont are [the Fiend]1979-the fiend ? ”[93-auriol] [he]93-auriol cried . “ If [you]93-auriol will have it so — certainly , ”[244-the other] replied [the other]244-the other . “ [You]167-rougemont are Satan in the form of [the man [I]93-auriol once knew]2017-the man i once knew , ”[93-auriol] cried [Auriol]93-auriol . “ [Avaunt]172-avaunt ! [I]93-auriol will have no dealings with [you]167-rougemont . ”[93-auriol] “ [I]244-the other thought [you]93-auriol wiser than to indulge in such idle fears , [Darcy]93-auriol , ”[244-the other] rejoined [the other]244-the other . “ Granting even [your]93-auriol silly notion of [me]244-the other to be correct , why need [you]93-auriol be alarmed ? [You]93-auriol are immortal . ”[244-the other] “ True , ”[93-auriol] rejoined [Auriol]93-auriol thoughtfully ; “ but yet — — ”[93-auriol] “ [Pshaw]105-pshaw ! ”[244-the other] rejoined [the other]244-the other , “ sign , and have done with the matter . ”[244-the other] “ By this compact [I]93-auriol am bound to deliver [a victim]2018-a victim — [a female victim]2019-a female victim — whenever [you]167-rougemont shall require it , ”[93-auriol] cried [Auriol]93-auriol . “ Precisely , ”[244-the other] replied [the other]244-the other ; “ [you]93-auriol can have no difficulty in fulfilling that condition . ”[244-the other] “ But if [I]244-the other fail in doing so , [I]244-the other am doomed — — ”[244-the other] “ But [you]93-auriol will not fail , ”[244-the other] interrupted [the other]244-the other , lighting a taper and sealing the parchment . “ Now sign it . ”[244-the other] [Auriol]93-auriol mechanically took the pen , and gazed fixedly on the document . “ [I]93-auriol shall bring eternal destruction on [myself]93-auriol if [I]93-auriol sign it , ”[93-auriol] [he]93-auriol muttered . “ A stroke of the pen will rescue [you]93-auriol from utter ruin , ”[167-rougemont] said [Rougemont]167-rougemont , leaning over [his]167-rougemont shoulder . “ Riches and happiness are [yours]93-auriol . [You]93-auriol will not have such another chance . ”[167-rougemont] “ [Tempter]173-tempter ! ”[93-auriol] cried [Auriol]93-auriol , hastily attaching [his]93-auriol signature to the paper . But [he]93-auriol instantly started back aghast at the fiendish laugh that rang in [his]93-auriol ears . “ [I]93-auriol repent — give it [me]93-auriol back ! ”[93-auriol] [he]93-auriol cried , endeavouring to snatch the parchment , which [Rougemont]167-rougemont thrust into [his]167-rougemont bosom . “ It is too late ! ”[922-the latter] cried [the latter]922-the latter , in a triumphant tone . “ [You]93-auriol are [mine]93-auriol — irredeemably mine . ”[922-the latter] “ Ha ! ”[93-auriol] exclaimed [Auriol]93-auriol , sinking back on the couch . “ [I]167-rougemont leave [you]93-auriol in possession of [[your]93-auriol house]2020-your house , ”[167-rougemont] pursued [Rougemont]167-rougemont ; “ but [I]167-rougemont shall return in a week , when [I]167-rougemont shall require [[my]167-rougemont first victim]2021-my first victim . ”[167-rougemont] “ [[Your]93-auriol first victim]2022-your first victim ! oh , Heaven ! ”[93-auriol] exclaimed [Auriol]93-auriol . “ Ay , and [my]167-rougemont choice falls on [Edith Talbot]171-edith ! ”[167-rougemont] replied [Rougemont]167-rougemont . “ [Edith Talbot]171-edith ! ”[93-auriol] exclaimed [Auriol]93-auriol ; “ [she]171-edith [[your]93-auriol victim]2023-your victim ! Think [you]93-auriol [I]93-auriol would resign [her]171-edith [I]93-auriol love better than life to [you]93-auriol ? ”[93-auriol] “ It is because [she]171-edith loves [you]93-auriol that [I]167-rougemont have chosen [her]171-edith , ”[167-rougemont] rejoined [Rougemont]167-rougemont , with a bitter laugh . “ And such will ever be the case with [you]93-auriol . Seek not to love again , for [your]93-auriol passion will be fatal to the object of it . When the week has elapsed , [I]167-rougemont shall require [Edith]171-edith at [your]93-auriol hands . Till then , farewell ! ”[167-rougemont] “ Stay ! ”[93-auriol] cried [Auriol]93-auriol . “ [I]93-auriol break the bargain with [thee]167-rougemont , [fiend]2024-fiend . [I]93-auriol will have none of it . [I]93-auriol abjure [thee]167-rougemont . ”[93-auriol] And [he]93-auriol rushed wildly after [Rougemont]167-rougemont , who had already gained [the larger chamber]1066-the larger chamber ; but , ere [he]93-auriol could reach [him]167-rougemont , [the mysterious individual]604-the mysterious individual had passed through the outer door , and when [Auriol]93-auriol emerged upon [the gallery]538-the gallery , [he]604-the mysterious individual was nowhere to be seen . [Several servants]1069-several servants immediately answered the frantic shouts of [the young man]298-the young man , and informed [him]298-the young man that [Mr. Rougemont]174-rougemont had quitted [the house]1655-the house some moments ago , telling [them]1069-several servants that [[their]1069-several servants master]1072-their master was perfectly satisfied with the arrangements [he]1072-their master had made for [him]174-rougemont . “ And [we]1069-several servants hope nothing has occurred to alter [your]298-the young man opinion , [sir]1707-sir ? ”[1073-the hall porter] said [the hall porter]1073-the hall porter . “ [You]298-the young man are sure [Mr. Rougemont]174-rougemont is gone ? ”[93-auriol] cried [Auriol]93-auriol . “ Oh , quite sure , [sir]1707-sir , ”[1073-the hall porter] cried [the hall porter]1073-the hall porter . “ [I]1073-the hall porter helped [him]174-rougemont on with [his]174-rougemont cloak [myself]1073-the hall porter . [He]174-rougemont said [he]174-rougemont should return this day week . ”[1073-the hall porter] “ If [he]174-rougemont comes [I]93-auriol will not see [him]174-rougemont , ”[93-auriol] cried [Auriol]93-auriol sharply ; “ mind that . Deny [me]93-auriol to [him]174-rougemont ; and on no account whatever let [him]174-rougemont enter [the house]1655-the house . ”[93-auriol] “ [Your]93-auriol orders shall be strictly obeyed , ”[886-the porter] replied [the porter]886-the porter , staring with surprise . “ Now leave [me]93-auriol , ”[93-auriol] cried [Auriol]93-auriol . And as [they]1076-they quitted [him]93-auriol , [he]93-auriol added , in a tone and with a gesture of the deepest despair , “ All precautions are useless . [I]93-auriol am indeed lost ! ”[93-auriol] On returning to the cabinet , where [his]93-auriol fatal compact with [Rougemont]174-rougemont had been signed , [Auriol]93-auriol perceived the pocket - book lying on the floor near the table , and , taking it up , [he]93-auriol was about to deposit it in the writing - desk , when an irresistible impulse prompted [him]93-auriol once more to examine its contents . Unfolding the roll of notes , [he]93-auriol counted them , and found they amounted to more than a hundred thousand pounds . The sight of so much wealth , and the thought of the pleasure and the power it would procure [him]93-auriol , gradually dispelled [his]93-auriol fears , and arising in a transport of delight , [he]93-auriol exclaimed—“Yes , yes — all obstacles are now removed ! When [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot finds [I]93-auriol am become thus wealthy , [he]175-mr. talbot will no longer refuse [me]93-auriol [[his]175-mr. talbot daughter]839-his daughter . But [I]93-auriol am mad , ”[93-auriol] [he]93-auriol added , suddenly checking [himself—“worse]2029-himself—“worse than mad , to indulge such hopes . If it be indeed the Fiend to whom [I]93-auriol have sold [myself]93-auriol , [I]93-auriol have no help from perdition ! If it be [man]1775-man , [I]93-auriol am scarcely less terribly fettered . In either case , [I]93-auriol will not remain [here]1437-here longer ; nor will [I]93-auriol avail [myself]93-auriol of this accursed money , which has tempted [me]93-auriol to [my]93-auriol undoing . ”[93-auriol] And , hurling the pocket - book to the farther end of [the room]405-the room , [he]93-auriol was about to pass through the door , when a mocking laugh arrested [him]93-auriol . [He]93-auriol looked round with astonishment and dread , but could see [no one]1426-no one . After a while , [he]93-auriol again moved forward , but a voice , which [he]93-auriol recognised as that of [Rougemont]174-rougemont , called upon [him]93-auriol to stay . “ It will be in vain to fly , ”[1079-the unseen speaker] said [the unseen speaker]1079-the unseen speaker . “ [You]93-auriol can not escape [me]1079-the unseen speaker . Whether [you]93-auriol remain here or not — whether [you]93-auriol use the wealth [I]1079-the unseen speaker have given [you]93-auriol , or leave it behind [you]93-auriol — [you]93-auriol can not annul [your]93-auriol bargain . With this knowledge , [you]93-auriol are at liberty to go . But remember , on the seventh night from this [I]1079-the unseen speaker shall require [Edith]171-edith Talbot from [you]93-auriol ! ”[1079-the unseen speaker] “ Where are [you]1079-the unseen speaker , [fiend]2024-fiend ? ”[93-auriol] demanded [Auriol]93-auriol , gazing around furiously . “ Show [yourself]93-auriol , that [I]995-the voice may confront [you]93-auriol . ”[995-the voice] A mocking laugh was the only response deigned to this injunction . “ Give [me]93-auriol back the compact , ”[93-auriol] cried [Auriol]93-auriol imploringly . “ It was signed in ignorance . [I]93-auriol knew not the price [I]93-auriol was to pay for [your]93-auriol assistance . Wealth is of no value to [me]93-auriol without [Edith]171-edith . ”[93-auriol] “ Without wealth [you]93-auriol could not obtain [her]171-edith , ”[995-the voice] replied [the voice]995-the voice . “ [You]93-auriol are only , therefore , where [you]93-auriol were . But [you]93-auriol will think better of the bargain to - morrow . Meanwhile , [I]995-the voice counsel [you]93-auriol to place the money [you]93-auriol have so unwisely cast from [you]93-auriol safely under lock and key , and to seek repose . [You]93-auriol will awaken with very different thoughts in the morning . ”[995-the voice] “ How am [I]93-auriol to account for [my]93-auriol sudden accession of wealth ? ”[93-auriol] inquired [Auriol]93-auriol , after a pause . “ [You]93-auriol [a gambler]2033-a gambler , and ask that question ! ”[1081-the unseen stranger] returned [the unseen stranger]1081-the unseen stranger , with a bitter laugh . “ But [I]1081-the unseen stranger will make [your]93-auriol mind easy on that score . As regards [the house]1655-the house , [you]93-auriol will find a regular conveyance of it within that writing - desk , while the note lying on the table , which bears [your]93-auriol address , comes from [me]1081-the unseen stranger , and announces the payment of a hundred and twenty thousand pounds to [you]93-auriol , as a debt of honour . [You]93-auriol see [I]1081-the unseen stranger have provided against every difficulty . And now , farewell ! ”[1081-the unseen stranger] The voice was then hushed ; and though [Auriol]93-auriol addressed several other questions to [the unseen speaker]1079-the unseen speaker , no answer was returned [him]93-auriol . After some moments of irresolution , [Auriol]93-auriol once more took up the pocket - book , and deposited it in the writing - desk , in which [he]93-auriol found , as [he]93-auriol had been led to expect , a deed conveying [the house]1655-the house to [him]93-auriol . [He]93-auriol then opened the note lying upon the table , and found its contents accorded with what had just been told [him]93-auriol . Placing it with the pocket - book , [he]93-auriol locked the writing - desk , exclaiming , “ It is useless to struggle further — [I]93-auriol must yield to fate ! ”[93-auriol] This done , [he]93-auriol went into [the adjoining room]1084-the adjoining room , and , casting [his]93-auriol eyes about , remarked the antique bottle and flagon . The latter was filled to the brim — how or with what , [Auriol]93-auriol paused not to examine ; but seizing the cup with desperation , [he]93-auriol placed it to [his]93-auriol lips , and emptied it at a draught . A species of intoxication , but pleasing as that produced by opium , presently succeeded . All [his]93-auriol fears left [him]93-auriol , and in [their]1085-their place the gentlest and most delicious fancies arose . Surrendering [himself]93-auriol delightedly to [their]1085-their influence , [he]93-auriol sank upon a couch , and for some time was wrapped in a dreamy elysium , imagining [himself]93-auriol wandering with [Edith Talbot]171-edith in [a lovely garden]1086-a lovely garden , redolent of sweets , and vocal with the melody of birds . [Their]1087-their path led through [a grove]1088-a grove , in the midst of which was a fountain ; and [they]1087-their were hastening towards [its]1088-a grove marble brink , when all at once [Edith]171-edith uttered a scream , and , starting back , pointed to a large black snake lying before [her]171-edith , and upon which [she]171-edith would have trodden the next moment . [Auriol]93-auriol sprang forward and tried to crush the reptile with [his]93-auriol heel ; but , avoiding the blow , it coiled around [his]93-auriol leg , and plunged its venom teeth into [his]93-auriol flesh . The anguish occasioned by the imaginary wound roused [him]93-auriol from [his]93-auriol slumber , and looking up , [he]93-auriol perceived that [a servant]1089-a servant was in attendance . Bowing obsequiously , [the man]1669-the man inquired whether [he]93-auriol had occasion for anything . “ Show [me]93-auriol to [[my]93-auriol bedroom]2035-my bedroom — that is all [I]93-auriol require , ”[93-auriol] replied [Auriol]93-auriol , scarcely able to shake off the effect of the vision . And , getting up , [he]93-auriol followed [the man]1669-the man , almost mechanically , out of [the room]405-the room . It was late when [Auriol]93-auriol arose on the following morning . At first , finding [himself]93-auriol in [a large and most luxuriantly - furnished chamber]1093-a large and most luxuriantly - furnished chamber , [he]93-auriol was at a loss to conceive how [he]93-auriol came [there]1493-there , and it was some time before [he]93-auriol could fully recall the mysterious events of the previous night . As had been foretold , however , by [Rougemont]174-rougemont , [his]93-auriol position did not cause [him]93-auriol so much anxiety as before . After attiring [himself]93-auriol , [he]93-auriol descended to [the lower apartments]1095-the lower apartments , in one of which a sumptuous breakfast awaited [him]93-auriol ; and having partaken of it , [he]93-auriol took a complete survey of [the house]1655-the house , and found [it]1655-the house larger and more magnificent even than [he]93-auriol had supposed [it]1655-the house . [He]93-auriol next supplied [himself]93-auriol from the pocket - book with a certain sum , for which [he]93-auriol fancied [he]93-auriol might have occasion in the course of the day , and sallied forth . [His]93-auriol first business was to procure [a splendid carriage]1097-a splendid carriage and horses , and to order some new and rich habiliments to be made with the utmost expedition . [He]93-auriol then proceeded towards [May Fair]68-may fair , and knocked at the door of [a large house at the upper end of [Curzon Street]69-curzon street]1098-a large house at the upper end of curzon street . [His]93-auriol heart beat violently as [he]93-auriol was shown into [an elegant drawing - room]1099-an elegant drawing - room , and [his]93-auriol trepidation momentarily increased , until [the servant]1053-the servant reappeared and expressed [his]1053-the servant regret that [he]1053-the servant had misinformed [him]1053-the servant in stating that [Miss Talbot]176-miss talbot was at [home]1728-home . Both [she]176-miss talbot and [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot , [he]1053-the servant said , had gone out about half - an - hour ago . [Auriol]93-auriol looked incredulous , but without making any remark , departed . Hurrying [home]1728-home , [he]93-auriol wrote a few lines to [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot , announcing the sudden and extraordinary change in [his]93-auriol fortune , and formally demanding the hand of [Edith]171-edith . [He]93-auriol was about to despatch this letter , when a note was brought [him]93-auriol by [[his]93-auriol servant]1103-his servant . It was from [Edith]171-edith . Having ascertained [his]93-auriol new address from [his]93-auriol card , [she]171-edith wrote to assure [him]93-auriol of [her]171-edith constant attachment . Transported by this proof of [her]171-edith affection , [Auriol]93-auriol half devoured the note with kisses , and instantly sent off [his]93-auriol own letter to [[her]171-edith father]837-her father — merely adding a few words to say that [he]93-auriol would call for an answer on the morrow . But [he]93-auriol had not to wait thus long for a reply . Ere an hour had elapsed , [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot brought it in person . [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot was [a man of about sixty — tall , thin , and gentlemanlike in deportment , with grey hair , and black eyebrows , which lent considerable expression to the orbs beneath them]1105-a man of about sixty — tall , thin , and gentlemanlike in deportment , with grey hair , and black eyebrows , which lent considerable expression to the orbs beneath them . [His]175-mr. talbot complexion was a bilious brown , and [he]175-mr. talbot possessed none of the good looks which in [[his]175-mr. talbot daughter]839-his daughter had so captivated [Auriol]93-auriol , and which it is to be presumed , therefore , [she]839-his daughter inherited from [[her]839-his daughter mother]1107-her mother . [A thorough man of [the world]1457-the world]1108-a thorough man of the world , though not [an unamiable person]1110-an unamiable person , [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot was entirely influenced by selfish considerations . [He]175-mr. talbot had hitherto looked with an unfavourable eye upon [Auriol]93-auriol ’s attentions to [[his]93-auriol daughter]839-his daughter , from a notion that the connection would be very undesirable in a pecuniary point of view ; but the magnificence of [the house in [Saint James]70-saint james ’s Square]1112-the house in saint james ’s square , which fully bore out [Auriol]93-auriol ’s account of [his]93-auriol newly - acquired wealth , wrought a complete change in [his]175-mr. talbot opinions , and [he]175-mr. talbot soon gave [the young man]298-the young man to understand that [he]175-mr. talbot should be delighted to have [him]298-the young man for [a son - in - law]1679-a son - in - law . Finding [him]298-the young man so favourably disposed , [Auriol]93-auriol entreated [him]298-the young man to let the marriage take place — within three days , if possible . [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot was greatly grieved that [he]175-mr. talbot could not comply with [[his]175-mr. talbot young friend]1115-his young friend ’s request , but [he]175-mr. talbot was obliged to start the next morning for [Nottingham]71-nottingham , and could not possibly return under three days . “ But [we]2036-we can be married before [you]1115-his young friend go ? ”[93-auriol] cried [Auriol]93-auriol . “ Scarcely , [I]175-mr. talbot fear , ”[175-mr. talbot] replied [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot , smiling blandly . “ [You]1115-his young friend must control [your]1115-his young friend impatience , [[my]175-mr. talbot dear young friend]2037-my dear young friend . On the sixth day from this — that is , on Wednesday in next week — [we]2036-we are now at Friday — [you]1115-his young friend shall be made happy . ”[175-mr. talbot] The coincidence between this appointment , and the time fixed by [Rougemont]174-rougemont for the delivery of [[his]174-rougemont victim]1116-his victim , struck [Auriol]93-auriol forcibly . [His]93-auriol emotion , however , escaped [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot , who soon after departed , having engaged [[his]175-mr. talbot future son - in - law]1117-his future son - in - law to dine with [him]175-mr. talbot at seven o’clock . [Auriol]93-auriol , it need scarcely be said , was punctual to the hour , or , rather , [he]93-auriol anticipated it . [He]93-auriol found [Edith]171-edith alone in [the drawing - room]1118-the drawing - room , and seated near the window , which was filled with choicest flowers . On seeing [him]93-auriol , [she]171-edith uttered an exclamation of joy , and sprang to meet [him]93-auriol . [The young man]298-the young man pressed [his]298-the young man lips fervently to the little hand extended to [him]93-auriol . [Edith Talbot]171-edith was [a lovely brunette]1120-a lovely brunette . [Her]171-edith features were regular , and [her]171-edith eyes , which were perfectly splendid , were dark , almond - shaped , and of almost Oriental languor . [Her]171-edith hair , which [she]171-edith wore braided over [her]171-edith brow and gathered behind in a massive roll , was black and glossy as a raven ’s wing . [Her]171-edith cheeks were dimpled , [her]171-edith lips of velvet softness , and [her]171-edith teeth like ranges of pearls . Perfect grace accompanied all [her]171-edith movements , and [one]793-one only wondered that feet so small as those [she]171-edith possessed should have the power of sustaining a form which , though lightsome , was yet rounded in its proportions . “ [You]171-edith have heard , dear [Edith]171-edith , that [[your]171-edith father]1672-your father has consented to [our]2039-our union ? ”[93-auriol] said [Auriol]93-auriol , after gazing at [her]171-edith for a few moments in silent admiration . [Edith]171-edith murmured an affirmative , and blushed deeply . “ [He]1672-your father has fixed Wednesday next , ”[171-edith] pursued [Auriol]93-auriol ; “ but [I]171-edith wish an earlier day could have been named . [I]171-edith have a presentiment that if [our]2039-our marriage is so long delayed , it will not take place at all . ”[171-edith] “ [You]93-auriol are full of misgivings , [Auriol]93-auriol , ”[171-edith] [she]171-edith replied . “ [I]93-auriol confess it , ”[93-auriol] [he]93-auriol said ; “ and [my]93-auriol apprehensions have risen to such a point , that [I]93-auriol feel disposed to urge [you]171-edith to a private marriage , during [[your]171-edith father]1672-your father ’s absence . ”[93-auriol] “ Oh no , [Auriol]93-auriol ; much as [I]171-edith love [you]93-auriol , [I]171-edith could never consent to such a step , ”[171-edith] [she]171-edith cried . “ [You]93-auriol can not urge [me]93-auriol to it . [I]93-auriol would not abuse [[my]93-auriol dear father]2041-my dear father ’s trusting love . [I]93-auriol have never deceived [him]2041-my dear father , and that is the best assurance [I]93-auriol can give [you]93-auriol that [I]93-auriol shall never deceive [you]93-auriol . ”[93-auriol] Further conversation was interrupted by the entrance of [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot , who held out both [his]175-mr. talbot hands to [Auriol]93-auriol , and professed the greatest delight to see [him]93-auriol . And no doubt [he]175-mr. talbot was sincere . The dinner passed off most pleasantly , and so did the evening ; for [the old gentleman]1122-the old gentleman was in high spirits , and [his]1122-the old gentleman hilarity was communicated to [the young couple]611-the young couple . When [Auriol]93-auriol and [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot went up [- stairs]1631-- stairs to tea , [they]611-the young couple found that [[Edith]171-edith ’s aunt]1125-edith ’s aunt , [Mrs. Maitland]177-mrs. maitland , had arrived to take charge of [her]171-edith during [[her]171-edith father]837-her father ’s absence . [This lady]1127-this lady had always exhibited a partiality for [Auriol]93-auriol , and had encouraged [his]1122-the old gentleman suit to [[her]1127-this lady niece]1128-her niece ; consequently [she]1127-this lady was well satisfied with the turn affairs had taken . It was near midnight before [Auriol]93-auriol could tear [himself]93-auriol away ; and when [he]93-auriol rose to depart , [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot , who had yawned frequently , but fruitlessly , to give [him]93-auriol a hint , told [him]93-auriol [he]175-mr. talbot might depend upon seeing [him]93-auriol back on the evening of the third day , and in the meantime [he]175-mr. talbot committed [him]93-auriol to the care of [Mrs. Maitland]177-mrs. maitland and [Edith]171-edith . Three days flew by rapidly and delightfully ; and on the evening of the last , just as [the little party]1129-the little party were assembled in [the drawing - room]1118-the drawing - room , after dinner , [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot returned from this journey . “ Well , here [I]175-mr. talbot am ! ”[175-mr. talbot] [he]175-mr. talbot cried , clasping [Edith]171-edith to [his]175-mr. talbot bosom , “ without having encountered any misadventure . On the contrary , [I]175-mr. talbot have completed [my]175-mr. talbot business to [my]175-mr. talbot entire satisfaction . ”[175-mr. talbot] “ Oh , how delighted [I]171-edith am to see [you]175-mr. talbot , [dear papa]2042-dear papa ! ”[171-edith] exclaimed [Edith]171-edith . “ Now , [Auriol]93-auriol , [you]93-auriol can have no more apprehensions . ”[171-edith] “ Apprehensions of what ? ”[175-mr. talbot] cried [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot . “ Of some accident befalling [you]175-mr. talbot , which might have interfered with [our]2043-our happiness , [sir]1707-sir , ”[93-auriol] replied [Auriol]93-auriol . “ Oh , [lovers]842-lovers are full of idle fears ! ”[175-mr. talbot] cried [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot . “ [They]842-lovers are unreasonable beings . However , here [I]175-mr. talbot am , as [I]175-mr. talbot said before , safe and sound . To - morrow [we]2043-our will finish all preliminary arrangements , and the day after [you]93-auriol shall be made happy — ha ! ha ! ”[175-mr. talbot] “ Do [you]175-mr. talbot know , [papa]2046-papa , [Auriol]93-auriol intends to give a grand ball on [our]2043-our wedding - day , and has invited all [his]93-auriol acquaintance to it ? ”[171-edith] remarked [Edith]171-edith . “ [I]175-mr. talbot hope [you]175-mr. talbot have not invited [Cyprian Rougemont]174-rougemont ? ”[175-mr. talbot] said [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot , regarding [him]93-auriol fixedly . “ [I]93-auriol have not , [sir]1707-sir , ”[93-auriol] replied [Auriol]93-auriol , turning pale . “ But why do [you]1707-sir particularise [him]93-auriol ? ”[93-auriol] “ Because [I]175-mr. talbot have heard some things of [him]93-auriol not much to [his]93-auriol credit , ”[175-mr. talbot] replied [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot . “ What — what have [you]1707-sir heard , [sir]1707-sir ? ”[93-auriol] demanded [Auriol]93-auriol . “ Why , [one]793-one should n’t believe [all the ill one]2050-all the ill one hears of [a man]2051-a man ; and , indeed , [I]175-mr. talbot can not believe all [I]175-mr. talbot have heard of [Cyprian Rougemont]174-rougemont , ”[175-mr. talbot] replied [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot ; “ but [I]175-mr. talbot should be glad if [you]93-auriol dropped [his]174-rougemont acquaintance altogether . Unable to shake off the gloom which had stolen over [him]175-mr. talbot , [Auriol]93-auriol took [his]93-auriol leave , promising to meet [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot at [[his]93-auriol lawyer]1131-his lawyer ’s in [Lincoln ’s Inn]53-lincoln ’s inn , at noon on the following day . [He]93-auriol was [there]1493-there at the time appointed , and , to [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot ’s great delight , and the no small surprise of [the lawyer]1133-the lawyer , paid over a hundred thousand pounds , to be settled on [[his]93-auriol future wife]1134-his future wife . “ [You]93-auriol are [a perfect man of honour]2053-a perfect man of honour , [Auriol]93-auriol , ”[175-mr. talbot] said [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot , clapping [him]93-auriol on the shoulder , “ and [I]175-mr. talbot hope [Edith]171-edith will make [you]93-auriol [an excellent wife]2054-an excellent wife . The morning passed in other preparations . In the evening [the lovers]1135-the lovers met as usual , and separated with the full persuasion , on [Edith]171-edith ’s part at least , that the next day would make [them]1135-the lovers happy . Since the night of the compact , [Auriol]93-auriol had neither seen [Rougemont]167-rougemont , nor heard from [him]167-rougemont , and [he]93-auriol neglected no precaution to prevent [his]93-auriol intrusion . It was a delicious morning in May , and the sun shone brightly on [Auriol]93-auriol ’s gorgeous equipage , as [he]93-auriol drove to [St. George ’s]73-st. george ’s , [Hanover Square]74-hanover square , where [he]93-auriol was united to [Edith]171-edith . Thus far all seemed auspicious , and [he]93-auriol thought [he]93-auriol could now bill defiance to fate . With the object of [his]93-auriol love close beside [him]93-auriol , and linked to [him]93-auriol by the strongest and holiest ties , it seemed impossible [she]171-edith could be snatched from [him]93-auriol . Nothing occurred during the morning to give [him]93-auriol uneasiness , and [he]93-auriol gave orders that [a carriage]964-a carriage and four should be ready an hour before midnight , to convey [him]93-auriol and [[his]93-auriol bride]1137-his bride to [Richmond]31-richmond , where [they]1138-they were to spend [their]1138-they honeymoon . Night came , and with it began to arrive [the guests who were bidden to the ball . It was in all respects magnificent . The amusements of the evening commenced with a concert , which was performed by [the first singers from [the Italian Opera]1141-the italian opera]1140-the first singers from the italian opera ; after which , the ball was opened by [Auriol]93-auriol and [[his]93-auriol lovely bride]1142-his lovely bride . As soon as the dance was over , [Auriol]93-auriol made a sign to [an attendant , who instantly disappeared]1143-an attendant , who instantly disappeared . “ Are [you]171-edith prepared to quit this gay scene with [me]93-auriol , [Edith]171-edith ? ”[93-auriol] [he]93-auriol asked , with a heart swelling with rapture . “ Quite so , ”[1142-his lovely bride] [she]1142-his lovely bride replied , gazing at [him]93-auriol with tenderness ; “ [I]1142-his lovely bride long to be alone with [you]93-auriol . ”[1142-his lovely bride] “ Come , then , ”[93-auriol] said [Auriol]93-auriol . [The hall]1020-the hall , which [they]1145-they were obliged to cross , and which [they]1145-they entered from a side - door , was spacious and beautifully proportioned , and adorned with numerous statues on pedestals . The ceiling was decorated with fresco paintings , and supported by two stately scagliola pillars . From between these , [a broad staircase of white marble]1149-a broad staircase of white marble ascended to [the upper room]1150-the upper room . As [Auriol]93-auriol had foreseen , [the staircase]532-the staircase was thronged with [guests]1152-guests ascending to [the ball - room]1146-the ball - room , the doors of which being open , afforded glimpses of [the dancers]1154-the dancers , and gave forth strains of liveliest music . Anxious to avoid [a newly - arrived party in [the hall]1020-the hall]1155-a newly - arrived party in the hall , [Auriol]93-auriol and [[his]93-auriol bride]1137-his bride lingered for a moment near a pillar . “ Ha ! who is this ? ”[171-edith] cried [Edith]171-edith , as [a tall man , with a sinister countenance , and habited entirely in black]1158-a tall man , with a sinister countenance , and habited entirely in black , moved from the farther side of the pillar , and planted [himself]1158-a tall man , with a sinister countenance , and habited entirely in black in [their]1145-they path , with [his]1158-a tall man , with a sinister countenance , and habited entirely in black back partly towards [them]1145-they . A thrill of apprehension passed through [Auriol]93-auriol ’s frame . [He]93-auriol looked up and beheld [Rougemont]174-rougemont , who , glancing over [his]174-rougemont shoulder , fixed [his]174-rougemont malignant gaze upon [him]93-auriol . But let [us]1161-us avoid [those persons]2066-those persons . ”[174-rougemont] In another moment [they]1161-us were at the door . [The carriage]1162-the carriage was there with its four horses , and [a man - servant , in travelling attire]1163-a man - servant , in travelling attire , stood beside the steps . Reassured by the sight , [Auriol]93-auriol recovered [his]93-auriol courage , and suffered [Rougemont]174-rougemont to throw a cloak over [Edith]171-edith ’s shoulders . The next moment [she]171-edith tripped up the steps of [the carriage]1162-the carriage , and was ensconced within [it]1162-the carriage . [Auriol]93-auriol was about to follow [her]171-edith , when [he]93-auriol received a violent blow on the chest , which stretched [him]93-auriol on [the pavement]1165-the pavement . Before [he]93-auriol could regain [his]93-auriol feet , [Rougemont]174-rougemont had sprung into [the carriage]1162-the carriage . The steps were instantly put up by [the man - servant]1167-the man - servant , who mounted the box with the utmost celerity , while [the postillions]1168-the postillions , plunging spurs into [their]1168-the postillions horses , dashed off with lightning speed . As [the carriage]1162-the carriage turned the corner of [King Street]75-king street , [Auriol]93-auriol , who had just arisen , beheld , by the light of a lamp , [Rougemont]174-rougemont ’s face at the window of [the carriage]1162-the carriage , charged with an expression of the most fiendish triumph . “ What is the matter ? ”[175-mr. talbot] cried [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot , who had approached [Auriol]93-auriol , “ [I]175-mr. talbot came to bid [you]93-auriol good - bye . Where is the carriage?—what has become of [Edith]171-edith ? ”[175-mr. talbot] “ [She]171-edith is in the power of [the Fiend]1979-the fiend , and [I]93-auriol have sold [her]171-edith to [him]1979-the fiend , ”[93-auriol] replied [Auriol]93-auriol gloomily . “ What mean [you]93-auriol , [wretch]2068-wretch ? ”[175-mr. talbot] cried [Mr. Talbot]175-mr. talbot , in a voice of distraction . “ [I]175-mr. talbot heard that [Cyprian Rougemont]174-rougemont was [here]1437-here .
